h3.div: Welcome to the Lidgerwood Public School Website!

div.p: It is the desire of all staff to make Lidgerwood Public School a welcoming place to attend or visit.

Please explore our website and get to know us better. Should you have questions that cannot be answered through our website, please contact the school office at (701) 538-7341 between 8:00 a.m. & 4:00 p.m. so that we might assist you. We truly appreciate your interest in and support of our school and community.
